Body:
"""
        Check chi and p value against hand calculated values
        """
split = self.stats_random_data.best_con_split(self.ndarr, CHAID.
    ContinuousColumn(self.random_arr, weights=self.wt))
assert round(split.score, 4) == 2.0056
assert round(split.p, 4) == 0.1594
assert split.dof == 118.0
